investigation.title: Changes of Gene Expression in Euglena gracilis Obtained During the 29th DLR Parabolic Flight Campaign
investigation.description: Parabolic flight maneuvers of Novespace's Airbus A310 ZERO-G produce subsequent phases of hypergravity (about 20 s), microgravity (about 22 s) and another 20 s hypergravity on experiments located in the experiment area of the aircraft. The 29th DLR parabolic flight campaign consisted of four consecutive flight days with thirty-one parabolas each day.

project.funding: The work was funded by the DLR on behalf of the BMWi (grant 50WB1128). S.M.S.was supported by the Coordenação de Aperfeiçoamento de Pessoal de Nível Superior - Brasil (CAPES)

publications.title: Changes of Gene Expression in Euglena gracilis Obtained During the 29th DLR Parabolic Flight Campaign.
publications.summary: Changes of Gene Expression in Euglena gracilis Obtained During the 29th DLR Parabolic Flight Campaign. — 10.1038/s41598-019-50611-4
